about.title: Bab kula
about.content: Aku mahasiswa taun 3rd saiki sinau ing Secondary Technical School of Electrical Engineering Jecna. Bidang studiku yaiku Teknologi Informasi. Aku pinter basa C#, Java lan TypeScript, sing digunakake kanggo proyek pribadi lan sekolah.

work_1.job_desc:
Deskripsi proyek: program situs web ing tim

 (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Svelte)

work_2.job_desc: Deskripsi proyek: piranti lunak pemrograman perbankan sing ngasilake kunci (TypeScript)

project_1.name: Tamagotchi
project_1.desc: Versi digital saka game populer Tamagotchi ngendi pangguna njupuk care saka pet virtual ing browser. Pet kasebut duwe sawetara kabutuhan dhasar sing kudu dicukupi kanthi rutin. (TypeScript, React)

project_2.name: Game Sandi
project_2.desc: A game browser kang pangguna kudu ngetik sandhi sing marem krit√©ria diwenehi. (TypeScript, React)

project_3.name: Proyek Database
project_3.desc: Antarmuka pangguna konsol kanggo database. (C#, MSSQL)
